name: Mais Simples Ltda
description: Developer of team management software designed to increase the productivity of employees while working as a team. The company's software offers a work collaboration interface that assists managers in organizing and managing their tasks, time, costs, workflow, and talent, enabling clients to increase profitability and reduce operational costs.
one_liner: Developer of team management software designed to increase the productivity of employees while working as a team.
